T02TD2809E:165b-0: @165b * // thugs rje chen po dpag bsam gyi shing can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2809E:165b-1: dpag med bsod nams ye shes tshogs rab smin pa'i rgyus //
T02TD2809E:165b-2: gang sku mi gtod dpag bsam shing chen bsil grib can //
T02TD2809E:165b-3: 'gro ba'i don du shin tu rmad byung sku ston pa //
T02TD2809E:165b-4: spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che mnga' 'dir mnyes brjod //
T02TD2809E:165b-5: thog mar rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2809E:165b-6: phyi dang nang la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa sgyur ba'i rim pas rgyas btab la /
T02TD2809E:165b-7: bdag ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i dang la gnas pas /
T02TD2809E:165b-8: rin po che'i sa gzhi las mngon par byung ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing gi yal ga dang /
T02TD2809E:165b-9: me tog dang 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgyas pa /
T02TD2809E:165b-10: spos kyi ngad zhim pos bsrung zhing de las grub pa'i sil snyan gyi sgras chos kyi sgo thams cad yang dag par ston pa /
T02TD2809E:165b-11: lha'i bu dang bu mo la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bstod cing phu dud byas pa'i sdong bu chen po la bzhugs pa ni /
T02TD2809E:165b-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kun nas 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po /
T02TD2809E:165b-13: kun du zhal kha dog bzhi pa phyag brgyad kyis rab tu mdzes pa rdo rje skyil mo krung gis mi g-yo bar bzhugs shing /
T02TD2809E:165b-14: 'od dpag tshad gcig pas btsun mo dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lham me lhang nger gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2809E:165b-15: chags bral chags pa'i kha dog can //
T02TD2809E:165b-16: nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa'i sku //
T02TD2809E:165b-17: blta bas mi ngoms btsun mo dang //
T02TD2809E:165b-19: gzhan dag sdod bu las phye ba //
T02TD2809E:165b-20: dgu brgya dgu bcu dgu yal ga / zla ba nyi ma sogs steng du /
T02TD2809E:165b-21: skal bzang sangs rgyas 'dzum pa mdzad//
T02TD2809E:166a-0: @166a * // sh'akya'i rgyal po thugs ka dang //
T02TD2809E:166a-1: 'od dpag med dpal cod pan dang //
T02TD2809E:166a-2: smin mtshams na ni mi bskyod pa //
T02TD2809E:166a-3: phyag mthil rdo rje mgrin sngon nyid //
T02TD2809E:166a-5: bkra shis rdzas dang nor dang 'bru //
T02TD2809E:166a-6: me tog rgyan dang mchod rdzas sman //
T02TD2809E:166a-7: gang yod ma lus 'dir sbrul bya //
T02TD2809E:166a-8: beed'ur rang bzhin sdong bu rab tu kun nas brjid chags 'khrungs pa yi //
T02TD2809E:166a-9: yal ga bzang gyes phyogs bcur 'dud rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khur khyer zhing //
T02TD2809E:166a-10: 'bras bu g-yur za me tog kha phye phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin ston pa //
T02TD2809E:166a-11: mkha' khyab dri ldang 'jig rten gsum skyabs dga' ba skyed par byed pa yin /
T02TD2809E:166a-12: ye shes pa spyan drangs nas gus pas rdzas dang bcas pas rim gro rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2809E:166a-14: 'gro ba'i don du gsol ba btab ste /
T02TD2809E:166a-15: rang gi spyod yul du gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD2809E:166a-16: de'i 'og tu dpag bsam gyi mchod pa dbul ba dang /
T02TD2809E:166a-17: lhan cig tu rig sngags bzla zhing gar mkhan dang rol mo mkhan dang /
T02TD2809E:166a-18: glu mkhan la sogs pas dgyes pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2809E:166a-20: nam zhig skyo bar gyur na yang //
T02TD2809E:166a-21: ye shes rten la bsdus nas su //
T02TD2809E:166a-22: dam tshig dran pa'i rgyas btab ste //
T02TD2809E:166a-23: tshogs brngar ba ni mkhas pa'i lugs //
T02TD2809E:166a-24: dpag bsam gyi shing can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
